name: Wizard's Pub Crawl
description:
Wizard's Pub Crawl is an isometric PvPvE Capture the Flag game that features LAN multiplayer. Fight your way through the dungeon to capture the magic Ale! Go at it solo or compete against a friend.

Legend has it the former residents of this derelict keep discovered a magical Ale said to bring long life and good fortune. The good fortune bit was clearly false since they all died to savage invaders, who now hoard it for themselves. Regardless, it is up to you to make sure it is in more capable, deserving hands (yours).

Please drink responsibly.

Controls (Rebindable)

MovementWASDAimMouse
Basic Attack
Left Click
Advanced Skills
1, 2, 3, 4

Gameplay Programming: Ethan Chan, Simon Ma, Thien Trandinh, Susan Yuen, Zihao Chen

Network Programming: Ethan Chan, Thien Trandinh, Susan Yuen

UI: Susan Yuen, Simon Ma, Thien Trandinh

Level Design: Simon Ma
